Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: FINDINGS : 85 women met the inclusion criteria for VTE , two of whom were users of progestagen - only OCs .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| progestagen |
| estrogen and progestagen (in the context of "progestagen-only OCs" - "OCs" stands for oral contraceptives) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| progestagen |
| estrogen and progestagen (in the context of "progestagen-only OCs") |

Note: In the original paragraph, "OCs" stands for oral contraceptives, which are medications that contain both estrogen and progestagen. However, in this context, only "progestagen" is explicitly mentioned as one of the chemicals, while "estrogen and progestagen" is mentioned as a group. Since the paragraph does not specify which form of estrogen is being referred to, it is not included in the table as a separate entity. Instead, it is included as part of the "progestagen-only OCs" entity.
